list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: any of the flat appendages growing from a bird's skin and forming its plumage, consisting of a partly hollow horny shaft fringed with vanes of barbs.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the waxwing has very bright feathers and a prominent crest
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Waxwing có lông rất sáng và một đỉnh nổi bật

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: rotate the blades of (a propeller) about their own axes in such a way as to lessen the air or water resistance.
float, move, or wave like a feather.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the green fronds feathered against a blue sky
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những con fronds xanh lông trên bầu trời xanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of ink, lipstick, etc.) separate into tiny lines after application.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the ink started to feather and smudge
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mực bắt đầu lông và smudge

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: shorten or taper the hair by cutting or trimming.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: my sister had her hair feathered
